sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { EmployeeSkill, EmployeeSkillService } from '../../services/employee-skill.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-skills', templateUrl: './employee-skills.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-skills.component.css'], standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule] // CommonModule pour *ngIf, *ngFor et date pipe }) export class EmployeeSkillsComponent implements OnInit { skills: EmployeeSkill[] = []; loading = false; error = ''; constructor(private skillService: EmployeeSkillService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadSkills(); } loadSkills(): void { this.loading = true; this.error = ''; this.skillService.getAll().subscribe({ next: (data) => { this.skills = data; this.loading = false; }, error: (err) => { this.error = err?.message || 'Erreur lors du chargement'; this.loading = false; } }); } deleteSkill(employee_id: number, skill_id: number): void { if (!confirm('Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cette compétence ?')) return; this.skillService.delete(employee_id, skill_id).subscribe({ next: () => this.loadSkills(), error: (err) => this.error = err?.message || 'Erreur lors de la suppression' }); } }
